column2: ICAO: WAQL formerly WRLP) is an airport serving the city of Long Apung
column5: Indonesia. Long Apung Airport is privately owned. Susi Air provide schedule flights from this airport to Samarinda and Tarakan. The airport resides at an elevation of 731 m (2
column6: 400 ft) above mean sea level. It has one runway designated 00/18 with bitumen surface measuring 840 m (2
column7: 756 ft) in length. Address: Long Apung
